data.message: Just Wondering Why you have a Like Button facebook Support Team??? as i been Blocked for Liking Others Posts as i wasnt going fast in clicking Like!!, Why Block people in Liking others People Posts On Their pages here on Facebook !!Get a Grip !!!,Why have This Feature If you Keep Blocking Folk !!!! Get a Life And Act Correct !!! I Like & thats It  OKay  (y)

replies.message: Hi RJ. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/29Ap0M0. -Kevin
Thank you  As I Support Musicians On Facebook and click like in supporting them As I Run My Label Through Facebook ,Kindly keep my page to run ok !!! Thank you for Replying Godbless !
